io.github.utk003.util.misc

Class ArrayUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.utk003.util.misc.ArrayUtil

  • @ScheduledForRelease(inVersion="v3.0.0")
public abstract class ArrayUtil
extends Object
    A suite of miscellaneous array-based utility functions not provided by Arrays.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    Version:
    July 20, 2021
    Author:
    Utkarsh Priyam (utk003)

      • swap

        public static void swap(@NotNull
                        @NotNull byte[] arr,
                        int i1,
                        int i2)
        Swaps the given positions in an array.
        Parameters:
        arr - The array whose elements will be swapped
        i1 - The index of the first element to swap
        i2 - The index of the second element to swap
        Throws:
        ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If either i1 or i2 is out-of-bounds with respect to the given array arr
